text: Bughouse Bellhops is a 1915 American short comedy film featuring Harold Lloyd. ==Cast== * Harold Lloyd as Lonesome Luke * Snub Pollard (as Harry Pollard) * Gene Marsh * Bebe Daniels ==See also== * List of American films of 1915 * Harold Lloyd filmography ==References== ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:American films Category:American short films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1915 comedy films Category:1915 short films Category:Films directed by Hal Roach Category:American comedy films Category:Lonesome Luke films Category:Comedy short films
title: Bughouse Bellhops
